name: Maleficent
recipe:
Tall Glass
 2 oz Malibu
 1 oz Blue Curacao
 1.5 oz Pineapple Juice
 2oz Sprite
 Top With Grenadine
 Garnish with Orange

name: Bloody Mary
recipe:
Margherita Glass
 2 oz Vodka
 4-6 oz Blood Mary Mix

 Garnishes: Lemon, Lime, Beef Stick, Olive Sword, Pickle, Celery Seed, Asparagus

name: Sweet Poison
recipe:
Short Glass (10 oz)
Build
 1.5 oz Malibu
 1 oz Blue Curacao
 Fill With Pineapple Juice
 Garnish with Lemon and Cherry

name: Hades' Lagoon
recipe:
Highball Glass
 Build
 2oz Vodka
 Fill w/ Lemonade
 1oz Blue Curacao on Top
 Garnish with Lemon

name: Bahama Mama
recipe:
Doubles Glass
 Shake
 1oz Captain Morgan
 1oz Malibu
 1.5 oz Orange Juice
 1.5 oz Pineapple Juice
 Shake then pour over ice
 Grenadine for colour
 Garnish with Orange

 2oz Sweet & Sour

 Garnish with Cherry

recipe:
Tall Glass

recipe:

recipe:
Tall Glass
 Build
